snippet: A surge in biotechnology shares helped the stock market overcome weak earnings and a slump in the retail sector.
abstract: Stock market rises on surge in biotechnology shares, helping investors brush off disappointing retail sales data.
lead_paragraph: A surge in biotechnology shares helped the stock market overcome weak earnings and a slump in the retail sector.

headline.main: Shares Rise, as Biotech Gains Offset Listless Retail Sales
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise, as Biotech Gains Offset Listless Retail Sales
